import React from'react';import'./TeamCards.css';// Import the CSS file for styles
import{teamMembers}from"../../services/services";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TeamCards=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",style:{backgroundColor:'whitesmoke',marginTop:30,paddingTop:20},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:{color:'#41999c',textAlign:'center'},children:"Meet our creative minds"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:teamMembers.map((member,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-12 col-sm-6 col-md-4 col-lg-3 mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card custom-hover-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:member.imageSrc,alt:"Profile",className:"custom-card-img-top",style:{width:'100%',height:200,objectFit:"cover"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:member.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",style:{color:'#3B999F',fontFamily:'bold'},children:member.designation}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"custom-additional-info",children:member.additionalInfo})]})]})},index))})]});};export default TeamCards;
